Title: Belba Butcher
Text:
Gaffer Gamgee is sure to know which hobbits have the best stories to tell of Bilbo's disappearance and his adventures and whereabouts since then.

Return to Gaffer after speaking to all of the hobbits.

Belba Butcher has agreed to share a story about Bilbo Baggins and his adventures.

Lore: §6Story told by a hobbit after Bilbo disappeared on his birthday.
display.Name: §3Hobbit Story

CompleteText:
Bilbo, eh? Now, folks will tell you any nonsense about what happened to Bilbo at his birthday party, but what’s the fun in that? It was all smoke and mirrors anyway, if you ask me.

The real story is in what happened after! Which, as it happens, I know all about.
